metadata.title: Explore Scientific Smartphone Adapter for 1.25" Eyepieces
features: This handy Explore Scientific adapter works with any smart phone, holding it securely with a setscrew to a standard size 1.25-inch eyepiece
And with 35 soft silicon rubber suction cups, it will hold your smart phone firmly in the precise position, allowing you to center the camera's lens for excellent and simply astrophotographs.
description: This handy Explore Scientific adapter works with any smart phone, holding it securely with a setscrew to a standard size 1.25-inch eyepiece. And with 35 soft silicon rubber suction cups, it will hold your smart phone firmly in the precise position, allowing you to center the camera's lens for excellent and simply astrophotographs.
